subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The Nashville Predators suspended forwards Alexander Radulov and Andrei Kostitsyn for Game 3 of their Western Conference semifinal series for an unspecified violation of team rules.
snippet: The Nashville Predators suspended forwards Alexander Radulov and Andrei Kostitsyn for Game 3 of their Western Conference semifinal series for an unspecified violation of team rules.
